Package fr.uge.net.tcp.nonblocking.display

Class AnsiColors

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.net.tcp.nonblocking.display.AnsiColors
public final class AnsiColors
extends java.lang.Object
Defines some ANSI colors ready to be used in the project. Also defines methods to color text and to generate colors.

    • fromRGB

      public static java.lang.String fromRGB​(int r, int g, int b)
      Converts color in (r,g,b) to an ANSI Color.
      Parameters:
      r - red value.
      g - green value.
      b - blue value..
      Returns:
      the escape value tha represent the requested color.

    • color

      public static java.lang.String color​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String ansi_color)
      Colors the message with the given ansi_color.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to color.
      ansi_color - the text color.
      Returns:
      the message colored.
